Uses of Class
org.jsimpledb.JSimpleDB

  • Packages that use JSimpleDB 
    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    org.jsimpledb.spring
    Spring Framework integration classes.

    • Uses of JSimpleDB in org.jsimpledb

      Methods in org.jsimpledb that return JSimpleDB 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSimpleDB JTransaction.getJSimpleDB()
      Get the JSimpleDB associated with this instance.
      JSimpleDB JClass.getJSimpleDB()
      Get the JSimpleDB with which this instance is associated.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected JSimpleDB JSimpleDBTransactionManager.jdb
      The configured JSimpleDB from which transactions are created.
      Methods in org.jsimpledb.spring that return JSimpleDB 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected JSimpleDB OpenTransactionInViewFilter.lookupJSimpleDB()
      Look up the JSimpleDB that this filter should use.
      Methods in org.jsimpledb.spring with parameters of type JSimpleDB 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JSimpleDBTransactionManager.setJSimpleDB(JSimpleDB jdb)
      Configure the JSimpleDB that this instance will operate on.
